Title: Microsoft Previews Tye Tool for Microservices Development in VS Code -- Visual Studio Magazine
Description: Microsoft is previewing a new Visual Studio Code extension for working with the open source, experimental Tye project that's used for microservice and distributed application development.

Title: How Netflix uses eBPF flow logs at scale for network insight
Description: By Alok Tiagi, Hariharan Ananthakrishnan, Ivan Porto Carrero and Keerti Lakshminarayan

Title: Tutorial: Host RESTful API with CORS - Azure App Service
Description: Learn how Azure App Service helps you host your RESTful APIs with CORS support. App Service can host both front-end web apps and back end APIs.
